questions.quote: Where did I get the coffee? Where do think I got the coffee, at the grocery store.
But, unfortunately I will be out of town with my lady-friend and therefore unable to bid on the lot. I was hoping maybe you would go in my stead.
Yeah, Tommy, this is Connie. You gotta help me. Some guy dropped dead on top of me.  I can't call the cops, 'cos Joey might find out.  I can't. I'm stuck. You gotta help me.
Oh, no no no no, don't concern yourself with me, because I'm - I'm good. I'm - I'm very good, I mean I'm really very, very good.
Would you be able to come all the way downtown again in rush hour to pick me up?
Kramer, I know what I'm talking about. There's no way FDR wants you to drop dead.
She knew who I was! She saw me in a club one time! My first date ever with the Pacific Rim. I'm very excited.
Oh, very refreshing.  Sex is like joining a private club. I'll be the same me tomorrow, but suddenly, the no trespassing sign will be gone.
The very pants I was returning. That's perfect irony! Elaine, that is interesting writing!
Well, if you ever talk to her, tell her I'm sorry. Elaine too. She feels terrible.
